recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Pangan (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will support various Continuous Improvement activities, including conducting loss analysis, identifying improvement opportunities, and helping develop structured improvement plans. This role involves working closely with the CI team and production departments to gather data, observe processes on the production floor, and assist in implementing efficiency initiatives. The intern will also help prepare reports, summarize findings, and monitor the progress of improvement actions. This position is onsite at the Gunung Putri plant.
